page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Employment in the Par area is very low. There are few major employers, but many small ones. Although there aren't many employers in Par, il must be noted that many people work in the nearby centre of St. Austell, and the china clay mines to the North-West. The main employers are:- Par E.C.C. docks, Carlyon Bay Leisure World, major hotels in Carlyon Bay, two garden centres, plant nurseries, building and catering merchants, garages and filling stations, a coch firm, a manufacturing plant building pressure hoses for E.C.C., two 'Sunday Markets', a craft centre, a hospital dealing with disabled children, and many small employers such as shops, etc. Many jobs in Carlyon Bay and Par are seasonal.
